abstract: BP announced a deal to sell its Colombian oil and gas exploration and production business to Ecopetrol and Talisman Energy for $1.9 billion.
snippet: BP announced a deal to sell its Colombian oil and gas exploration and production business to Ecopetrol and Talisman Energy for $1.9 billion.
lead_paragraph: BP made more progress in its multibillion-dollar asset sales on Tuesday, announcing a deal to sell its Colombian oil and gas exploration and production business to Ecopetrol and Talisman Energy for $1.9 billion in cash.

headline.main: BP Sales Continue With Colombian Deal
